form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: DEPARTMENT OF STATE FOREIGN SERVICE OF THE UNITED STATES OF AMERICA MEDICAL EXAMINATION OF VISA APPLICANTS, FS-398

full_text: Screened by NARA, 5/8/2023 GABINETT AYOS X Y LABORATORIO PLACE DHES. EPHEN CONTRERAS Y OSCAH TODD DEPARTMENT OF STATE LERDO 240 NORTE CD. JUAREZ, CHIH., MEXICO FOREIGN SERVICE OF THE UNITED STATES OF AMERICA MEDICAL EXAMINATION OF VISA APPLICANTS DATE OF EXAMINATION FEB 14 1973 CITY COUNTRY At the request of the American Consul at CD. JUAREZ, CHIH. MEXICO NAME AGE SEX I certify that on the above date I examined ROBERTO RIVERA RUBIO 58 M I examined specifically for evidence of any of the following conditions: CLASS A: DANGEROUS CONTAGIOUS DISEASES: 136 lb 62" Chancroid Lymphogranuloma venereum Gonorrhea Syphilis, infectious stage Granuloma. inguinale Tuberculosis, active Leprosy, infectious MENTAL CONDITIONS: Mental retardation Previous occurrence of one or more Mental defect (mental deficiency) attacks of insanity Narcotic drug addiction Insanity Psychopathic personality Chronic alcoholism Sexual deviation (See proviso, sec. 34.7, USPHS Regs.) CLASS B: Physical Defect, Disease, or Disability Serious in Degree or Permanent in Nature Amounting to a Substantial Departure from Normal Physical Well-Being. CLASS C: Minor Conditions. (CHECK NUMBER (1) BELOW OR COMPLETE NUMBER (2)) My examination, including the X-ray and other reports below, revealed: (1) No defect, disease, or disability. (2) Defect, disease, or disability, or previous occurrence of one or more attacks of insanity, as follows (give class - A, B, or C - diagnosis, and pertinent details*): 0900 FEB 14 1973 Tbc. NEG Chest X-ray report E contrias from Dr. FEB 14 1973 NEG 6. June Blood serological report from Dr. Other special report(s) (when needed) from Dr. SIGNATURE OF MEDICAL TECHNICAL ADVISOR TITLE DATE OF FINAL REPORT 6. June DRES. x CONTREALS T O. TODD FEB 14 1973 FORM *Continue on reverse side if necessary. FS-398 7-71
